2024 年 7 月 4 日星期四 04:07:19 +0000每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
人工智能时代的魔法与奇迹 |邝大卫邝大卫With AI everywhere you look, you may think you've seen it all. Magician David Kwong suggests otherwise, proposing advancements in technology actually increase opportunities for wonder. In an entertaining performance, he invites an audience member on stage to exhibit the mind-reading magic of ChatGPT — and explores how tech elevates our capacity for awe.人工智能时代的魔法与奇迹 |邝大卫With AI everywhere you look, you may think you've seen it all. Magician David Kwong suggests otherwise, proposing advancements in technology actually increase opportunities for wonder. In an entertaining performance, he invites an audience member on stage to exhibit the mind-reading magic of ChatGPT — and explores how tech elevates our capacity for awe. https://www.ted.com/talks/david_kwong_magic_and_wonder_in_the_age_of_ai?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:133770 133770 Wed, 03 Jul 2024 14:46:43 +0000高等教育不00:15:32泰德
民主需要不同意见。以下是如何做得更好 |布雷特·斯蒂芬斯和约丹诺斯·埃约尔布雷特·斯蒂芬斯和约丹诺斯·埃约尔As authoritarian leaders challenge democratic institutions around the world, some people are questioning whether democracy is even the best political system. In a wide-ranging conversation, writer Bret Stephens and social entrepreneur Yordanos Eyoel discuss why democracy is still our best hope — and offer ways we can learn to disagree more effectively in order to strengthen our societies.民主需要不同意见。以下是如何做得更好 |布雷特·斯蒂芬斯和约丹诺斯·埃约尔As authoritarian leaders challenge democratic institutions around the world, some people are questioning whether democracy is even the best political system. In a wide-ranging conversation, writer Bret Stephens and social entrepreneur Yordanos Eyoel discuss why democracy is still our best hope — and offer ways we can learn to disagree more effectively in order to strengthen our societies. https://www.ted.com/talks/bret_stephens_and_yordanos_eyoel_democracy_requires_disagreement_here_s_how_to_do_it_better?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:129700 129700 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 14:46:29 +0000高等教育不00:15:19泰德
人工智能的下一步？跳舞机器人|关凯蒂关凯蒂Would you tango with a robot? Inviting us into the fascinating world of dancing machines, robot choreographer Catie Cuan highlights why teaching robots to move with grace, intention and emotion is essential to creating AI-powered machines we will want to welcome into our daily lives.人工智能的下一步？跳舞机器人|关凯蒂Would you tango with a robot? Inviting us into the fascinating world of dancing machines, robot choreographer Catie Cuan highlights why teaching robots to move with grace, intention and emotion is essential to creating AI-powered machines we will want to welcome into our daily lives. https://www.ted.com/talks/catie_cuan_next_up_for_ai_dancing_robots?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:133460 133460 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 14:46:32 +0000高等教育不00:10:11泰德
已经适应气候危机的人们的经验教训|多卡斯·奈舒鲁阿多卡斯·奈舒鲁阿The Maasai people have lived sustainably off the savanna for centuries, raising cattle for sustenance and income. Climate activist Dorcas Naishorua paints a picture of how the climate crisis is threatening their way of life — and calls for local and international support as they're forced to adapt to a changing environment.已经适应气候危机的人们的经验教训|多卡斯·奈舒鲁阿The Maasai people have lived sustainably off the savanna for centuries, raising cattle for sustenance and income. 土壤中铅的隐患|伊薇特·卡布雷拉伊薇特·卡布雷拉There's an invisible health threat right under our feet, says investigative journalist Yvette Cabrera. She digs into the pervasive problem of lead contamination in soil — a particular risk for children in cities — and shares her action plan to map urban soils and help create healthier communities.土壤中铅的隐患|伊薇特·卡布雷拉There's an invisible health threat right under our feet, says investigative journalist Yvette Cabrera. 人工智能的过去 6 年——以及接下来会发生什么 |雷·库兹韦尔雷·库兹韦尔How will AI improve our lives in the years to come? From its inception six decades ago to its recent exponential growth, futurist Ray Kurzweil highlights AI's transformative impact on various fields and explains his prediction for the singularity: the point at which human intelligence merges with machine intelligence.人工智能的过去 6 年——以及接下来会发生什么 |雷·库兹韦尔How will AI improve our lives in the years to come? From its inception six decades ago to its recent exponential growth, futurist Ray Kurzweil highlights AI's transformative impact on various fields and explains his prediction for the singularity: the point at which human intelligence merges with machine intelligence. https://www.ted.com/talks/ray_kurzweil_the_last_6_decades_of_ai_and_what_comes_next?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:132599 132599 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 14:40:05 +0000高等教育不00:13:07泰德
如何使用微型机器人观察身体内部 |亚历克斯·吕布克、维韦克·昆巴里亚历克斯·吕布克、维韦克·昆巴里Would you swallow a micro-robot? In a gutsy demo, physician Vivek Kumbhari navigates Pillbot, a wireless, disposable robot swallowed onstage by engineer Alex Luebke, modeling how this technology can swiftly provide direct visualization of internal organs. Learn more about how micro-robots could move us past the age of invasive endoscopies and open up doors to more comfortable, affordable medical imaging. (This talk contains medical imagery.)如何使用微型机器人观察身体内部 |亚历克斯·吕布克、维韦克·昆巴里Would you swallow a micro-robot? In a gutsy demo, physician Vivek Kumbhari navigates Pillbot, a wireless, disposable robot swallowed onstage by engineer Alex Luebke, modeling how this technology can swiftly provide direct visualization of internal organs. Learn more about how micro-robots could move us past the age of invasive endoscopies and open up doors to more comfortable, affordable medical imaging. (This talk contains medical imagery.) https://www.ted.com/talks/alex_luebke_vivek_kumbhari_how_you_could_see_inside_your_body_with_a_micro_robot?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:132747 132747 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 14:51:26 +0000高等教育不00:08:58泰德
街头图书管理员致力于将书籍带给每个人 |故事书迷宫故事书迷宫As a self-proclaimed radical street librarian, Storybook Maze makes books appear where they're scarce. Through initiatives like free, public book vending machines and street corner story times, she eliminates book deserts — or areas with limited access to literature — by making books accessible for children in underserved communities. (And in case you're wondering, she shares how you can become a radical street librarian, too.)街头图书管理员致力于将书籍带给每个人 |故事书迷宫As a self-proclaimed radical street librarian, Storybook Maze makes books appear where they're scarce. Through initiatives like free, public book vending machines and street corner story times, she eliminates book deserts — or areas with limited access to literature — by making books accessible for children in underserved communities. (And in case you're wondering, she shares how you can become a radical street librarian, too.) https://www.ted.com/talks/storybook_maze_a_street_librarian_s_quest_to_bring_books_to_everyone?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:130850 130850 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 17:29:57 +0000高等教育不00:08:40泰德
一项科学突破可能会改变我们生产食物的方式 |大卫·弗里德伯格大卫·弗里德伯格Agriculture fundamentally changed the way humans live — but at a cost, using up huge tracts of land and wreaking havoc on the environment, even as millions still go hungry. Entrepreneur and investor David Friedberg paints a picture of the evolution of agriculture and introduces a scientific breakthrough — "boosted breeding" — that might just transform how the world produces food. (This conversation was recorded live with head of TED Chris Anderson.)一项科学突破可能会改变我们生产食物的方式 |大卫·弗里德伯格Agriculture fundamentally changed the way humans live — but at a cost, using up huge tracts of land and wreaking havoc on the environment, even as millions still go hungry. Entrepreneur and investor David Friedberg paints a picture of the evolution of agriculture and introduces a scientific breakthrough — "boosted breeding" — that might just transform how the world produces food. (This conversation was recorded live with head of TED Chris Anderson.) https://www.ted.com/talks/david_friedberg_a_scientific_breakthrough_that_could_transform_how_we_product_food?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:133189 133189 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 16:03:19 +0000高等教育不01:05:38泰德
人造肉是食品的未来吗？ |乌玛·瓦莱蒂乌玛·瓦莱蒂The way we raise animals is destructive to humans, animals and the environment, says cardiologist and entrepreneur Uma Valeti. He presents a solution that doesn't require you to give up your favorite protein-packed meals: cultivated meat, grown directly from animal cells. Reportedly some of the "most chicken-y chicken" you'll taste, Valeti envisions how such cultivated meat could save billions of animal lives, improve human health and help protect our planet.人造肉是食品的未来吗？ |乌玛·瓦莱蒂The way we raise animals is destructive to humans, animals and the environment, says cardiologist and entrepreneur Uma Valeti. He presents a solution that doesn't require you to give up your favorite protein-packed meals: cultivated meat, grown directly from animal cells. Reportedly some of the "most chicken-y chicken" you'll taste, Valeti envisions how such cultivated meat could save billions of animal lives, improve human health and help protect our planet. https://www.ted.com/talks/uma_valeti_is_cultivated_meat_the_future_of_food?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:132784 132784 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 14:56:40 +0000高等教育不00:13:31泰德
爱就要勇敢|凯利·科里根凯利·科里根Family life often requires extraordinary bravery, from navigating the daily challenges to surviving the unexpected crises. Author and podcaster Kelly Corrigan offers profound wisdom (and seven key words) to help you focus in on what matters most.爱就要勇敢|凯利·科里根Family life often requires extraordinary bravery, from navigating the daily challenges to surviving the unexpected crises.
